And with 29 Electoral votes you can see how Trump's Florida is key. That said, the Florida Keys are looking like blue in 2020. The **[FiveThirtyEight Florida polls](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/florida/)** agree. - - - ## **But Americans Canâ€™t Bet On US Elections, Can They?** Not true.
